description: CheapShark is a price comparison website for digital PC Games. We keep track of prices across multiple stores including Steam, GreenManGaming, Fanatical, and many others.We offer a fully documented public API for developers to use CheapShark pricing data on their own app or website. The API is completely free, the only condition being that you use CheapShark links when sending users to deals (see details in next section). This is how we pay for hosting and development! :)
title: CheapShark
